00023 /* event queue */
00024 
00025 #include <stdio.h>
00026 #include <stdlib.h>
00027 #include <string.h>
00028 
00029 #include "event_queue.h"
00030 
00032 void event_queue_init(void) {
00033         for (unsigned char i=0;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++) {
00034                 event_list[i].func = NULL;
00035                 event_list[i].time_target = 0;
00036                 event_list[i].id = 0;
00037         }
00038 }
00039 
00043 char event_queue_add(EVENT_MESSAGE event) {
00044         for (unsigned char i=0;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++) {
00045                 if (event_list[i].func == NULL) {
00046                         event_list[i] = event;
00047                         return(i);
00048                 }
00049                 else if (event_list[i].time_target > event.time_target) {
00050                         EVENT_MESSAGE temp_event_list[EVENT_LIST_SIZE-i];
00051 
00052                         for (unsigned char count=0;count<EVENT_LIST_SIZE-i;count++)
00053                                 temp_event_list[count] = event_list[count+i];
00054 
00055                         event_list[i] = event;
00056 
00057                         for (unsigned char count=0;count<EVENT_LIST_SIZE-i-1;count++)
00058                                 event_list[i+count+1] = temp_event_list[count];
00059 
00060                         return(i);
00061                 }
00062         }
00063 
00064         return(-1);
00065 }
00066 
00069 void event_queue_wrap(unsigned int remove_val) {
00070         for (unsigned char i=0;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++) {
00071                 if (event_list[i].func != NULL)
00072                         event_list[i].time_target -= remove_val;
00073         }
00074 }
00075 
00078 EVENT_MESSAGE event_queue_get() {
00079         return(event_list[0]);
00080 }
00081 
00085 unsigned char event_in_queue(void) {    
00086         if (event_list[0].func != NULL)
00087                 return(1);
00088 
00089         return(0);
00090 }
00091 
00093 void event_queue_drop(void) {
00094         if (event_list[0].func != NULL) {
00095                 for (unsigned char i=1;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++)
00096                         event_list[i-1] = event_list[i];
00097         
00098                 event_list[EVENT_LIST_SIZE-1].func = NULL;
00099         }
00100 }
00101 
00104 unsigned char event_queue_count(void) {
00105         unsigned char i;
00106 
00107         for (i=0;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++)
00108                 if (event_list[i].func == NULL)
00109                         break;
00110 
00111         return(i);
00112 }
00113 
00115 void event_queue_dropall(void) {
00116         for (unsigned char i=0;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++) {
00117                 event_list[i].func = NULL;
00118                 event_list[i].time_target = 0;
00119                 event_list[i].id = 0;
00120         }       
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00126 int event_queue_drop_id(unsigned char id) {
00127         EVENT_MESSAGE temp_event_list[EVENT_LIST_SIZE];
00128         
00129         unsigned char id_dropped_count=0;
00130         unsigned char count=0;
00131 
00132         for (unsigned char i=0;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++) {
00133                 if (event_list[i].id != id)
00134                         temp_event_list[count++] = event_list[i];
00135                 else
00136                         id_dropped_count++;
00137         }
00138 
00139         for (unsigned char i=0;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++) {
00140                 if (i<(EVENT_LIST_SIZE-id_dropped_count))
00141                         event_list[i] = temp_event_list[i];
00142                 else {
00143                         event_list[i].func = NULL;
00144                         event_list[i].id = 0;
00145                         event_list[i].time_target = 0;
00146                 }       
00147         }
00148 
00149         return(id_dropped_count);
00150 }
00151 
00155 unsigned char event_queue_check_id(unsigned char id) {
00156         for (unsigned char i=0;i<EVENT_LIST_SIZE;i++)
00157                 if (event_list[i].id == id)     //ID found, return 1
00158                         return(1);
00159 
00160         //No id match found, return 0
00161         return(0);
00162 }
